word_mean: 配列：父母染色体对配子的各种联合的随机分配。结果，每个配子通常有一个染色体组(23个染色体一组)，包括每一型的染色体一个。染色体上的基因也是各自相配的，除非它们是连锁的

entry.def: An assortment is a group of similar things that are of different sizes or colours or have different qualities.

means.word_mean: 1. a collection containing a variety of sorts of things;

sentences.sentence: "a great assortment of cars was on display"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of distributing things into classes or categories of the same type

stems_affixes.word_buile: as不断+sort种类+ed……的→不断把各种东西放到一起的→各类的,多种的

con共同+sort种类→同类相聚→结交
